BasicInfo.short: FriendFeed is a feed aggregator that consolidates updates from social media, social bookmarking websites, blogs, and microblogging sites.

Products.name: FriendFeed
Products.description: FriendFeed currently supports the following social networks/services: * Amazon.com Wishlists * Blogs * Brightkite * del.icio.us * Diigo *
